column4: how can I add codecs to an old distro if i cant find repositories for it?
I saw it, i have an old asus a1000 and i cant install newer distros on it because it fails
you can learn to compile your own,, but usually adding some ram will get an older lappy up and running on at least dapper
it's currently running with 64MB pc100 and it works fine with 5.10, is it easy (and cheap) to find/buy memory like this?
